name: Reinvent Digital Media Pvt. Ltd.
description:

We specialize in ROI driven digital marekting campaigns and our digital experts redefine performance marketing by using analytics, technology, and media in innovative ways. We are committed to reinvent marketing, media and commerce for businesses by putting digital at the center. We help brands to understand how consumers are discovering their brands online and how stories are being shared across all digital channels.
